apis.description: Create a new OriginalityReport for the specified file

operations.notes: Create a new OriginalityReport for the specified file

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: originality_report[file_id]
parameters.description: The id of the file being given an originality score.

parameters.name: originality_report[originality_score]
parameters.description:
A number between 0 and 100 representing the measure of the
specified file's originality.

parameters.name: originality_report[originality_report_url]
parameters.description:
The URL where the originality report for the specified
file may be found.

parameters.name: originality_report[originality_report_file_id]
parameters.description:
The ID of the file within Canvas that contains the originality
report for the submitted file provided in the request URL.

parameters.name: originality_report[tool_setting][resource_type_code]
parameters.description:
The resource type code of the resource handler Canvas should use for the
LTI launch for viewing originality reports. If set Canvas will launch
to the message with type 'basic-lti-launch-request' in the specified
resource handler rather than using the originality_report_url.

parameters.name: originality_report[tool_setting][resource_url]
parameters.description:
The URL Canvas should launch to when showing an LTI originality report.
Note that this value is inferred from the specified resource handler's
message "path" value (See `resource_type_code`) unless
it is specified. If this parameter is used a `resource_type_code`
must also be specified.

parameters.name: originality_report[workflow_state]
parameters.description:
May be set to "pending", "error", or "scored". If an originality score
is provided a workflow state of "scored" will be inferred.

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: originality_report[originality_score]

Note that this value is inferred from the specified resource handler's

it is specified. If this parameter is used a `resource_type_code`
must also be specified.

parameters.description:
May be set to "pending", "error", or "scored". If an originality score
is provided a workflow state of "scored" will be inferred.

parameters.description:

specified file's originality.

parameters.description:

Note that this value is inferred from the specified resource handler's

parameters.description:

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID

resource_type_code.description: the resource type code of the resource handler to use to display originality reports

resource_url.description: a URL that may be used to override the launch URL inferred by the specified resource_type_code. If used a 'resource_type_code' must also be specified.

file_id.description: The id of the file receiving the originality score

originality_score.description: A number between 0 and 100 representing the originality score

originality_report_file_id.description: The ID of the file within Canvas containing the originality report document (if provided)

originality_report_url.description: A non-LTI launch URL where the originality score of the file may be found.

tool_setting.description: A ToolSetting object containing optional 'resource_type_code' and 'resource_url'
